General.Name: Jazan Development Co.
General.Description: Jazan Energy and Development Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the aquaculture, agricultural, manufacturing, industrial, real estate, and other businesses in Saudi Arabia. The company is involved in the cultivation of mangoes and shrimps; preservation of fish and fish products; cooling and freezing of fruits; production and packaging and distributing of pure filtered water; operates hotels and heritage; and other activities, as well as transportation of chilled and frozen goods. It also engages in the buying, selling, and renting of land and real estate properties; and online retail business. Jazan Energy and Development Company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jazan, Saudi Arabia.
